texts: a person runs and circles his foot over the ball.
a man runs straight and circles his right foot around the ball.
a person steps over the ball with his right foot while running.
a person jumps with arms slightly spread and lands with both feet apart.
a man spins slightly in mid-air and lands facing forward.
a person jumps and spins counterclockwise in mid-air.
a person squats down, grips a barbell, and pulls it upward.
a person squats down, lifts the bar in one motion, and stands upright.
a man jerks the weight overhead with arms straight.
